Platform.Title: Agilent_SALSIFY_Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium_5K
Platform.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium str. LT2
Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium str. SL1344
Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis str. P125109
Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium str. 14028S

Sample.Title: baeR mutant in LB Replicate 1

Channel.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium str. SL1344
Channel.Treatment-Protocol: The cells were treated with cold ethanol 20%, phenol 1% and left 30min on ice prior centrifugation.
Channel.Growth-Protocol: The media was inoculated with 1/1000 of over night culture and grown to OD600=1 at 37 C upon 200rpm agitation.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using Promega SV total RNA extration kit following manufacturer's instructions
Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: Total RNA (10 μg) was converted to cDNA and fluorescently labelled by random priming to incorporate Cy5-dCTP (Amersham) using reverse transcriptase (StrataScript, Stratagene). 2 µg of chromosomal was labelled with Cy3 dCTP using the Gibco Bioprime DNA labelling System.

Channel.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium str. SL1344
Channel.Treatment-Protocol: The cells were treated with cold ethanol 20%, phenol 1% and left 30min on ice prior centrifugation.
Channel.Growth-Protocol: The media was inoculated with 1/1000 of over night culture and grown to OD600=1 at 37 C upon 200rpm agitation.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using Promega SV total RNA extration kit following manufacturer's instructions
Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: Total RNA (10 μg) was converted to cDNA and fluorescently labelled by random priming to incorporate Cy5-dCTP (Amersham) using reverse transcriptase (StrataScript, Stratagene). 2 µg of chromosomal was labelled with Cy3 dCTP using the Gibco Bioprime DNA labelling System.

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Hybridisations were carried out in a 50μl volume per array. The volume of CyDye label cDNA was reduced in a SpeedVac and be adjusted to 21.5μL then denatured at 94°C for 2 min, centrifuge 2 min and let it cool at RT for 1 min. the labelled cDNA with 37.5μL of hybridisation buffer (Morpholine-4-ethanesulfonic acid (MES) hydrate (pH 6.5) (Sigma, M2933) 50 mM, Sodium chloride 1 M, 99% Formamide (Sigma, F5786) 20 % (w/v), EDTA 20 mM, Triton X-100 (Sigma, T8532) 1 % (w/v)). 50μl of hybridisation mix was pipetted onto the GASKET slide and an OGT array slide was placed in contact with the hybridisation mix. In a tight chamber, the arrays were hybridise at 55°C for 60 hours in a light tight hybridisation oven at 4 to 8 rpm. The slide was removed from the hybridisation chamber and washed with buffer 1 (6XSSPE, 0.005% N-lauryl sarcosine) for 5min under agitation and for 5 min with the wash buffer 2 (0.06X SSPE, 0.18% polyethylene glycol 200) then dried in a centrifuge.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Scanned on an GenePix 4000A scanner (Axon Instruments, Inc.). Images were quantified using Axon GenePrix Pro7
Sample.Data-Processing: Data were normalised using the Batch Anti-Banana Algorithm in R (BABAR) algorithm and software package which uses cyclic loess to normalise across the complete dataset (Alston et al., 2010).

The slide was removed from the hybridisation chamber and washed with buffer 1 (6XSSPE, 0.005% N-lauryl sarcosine) for 5min under agitation and for 5 min with the wash buffer 2 (0.06X SSPE, 0.18% polyethylene glycol 200) then dried in a centrifuge.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Scanned on an GenePix 4000A scanner (Axon Instruments, Inc.). Images were quantified using Axon GenePrix Pro7
Sample.Data-Processing: Data were normalised using the Batch Anti-Banana Algorithm in R (BABAR) algorithm and software package which uses cyclic loess to normalise across the complete dataset (Alston et al., 2010).

Sample.Title: baeR mutant in LB +20mM Tungstate Replicate 2

Channel.Source: baeR mutant in LB +20mM Tungstate OD600 =1
Channel.Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium str. SL1344
Channel.Treatment-Protocol: The cells were treated with cold ethanol 20%, phenol 1% and left 30min on ice prior centrifugation.
Channel.Growth-Protocol: The media was inoculated with 1/1000 of over night culture and grown to OD600=1 at 37 C upon 200rpm agitation.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using Promega SV total RNA extration kit following manufacturer's instructions
Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: Total RNA (10 μg) was converted to cDNA and fluorescently labelled by random priming to incorporate Cy5-dCTP (Amersham) using reverse transcriptase (StrataScript, Stratagene). 2 µg of chromosomal was labelled with Cy3 dCTP using the Gibco Bioprime DNA labelling System.

Series.Title: Salmonella wild type and mutant baeR in LB and tungstate
Series.Summary: Transcriptional profiling of Salmonella Typhimurium SL1344 wild type and deleted of the response regulator encoding gene baeR grown to OD600=1 in LB alone or in LB supplemented with 20mM of Sodium Tungstate. The goal is to determine Salmonella response to tungstate and to define the BaeR regulated genes in this conditions.
Series.Overall-Design: 4 differents conditions tested, the reference on each hybridisation is the chromosomique DNA of the wild type strain. 3 replicates for the wild type on LB, 3 replicates for the baeR on LB, 3 replicates for the wild type on LB+ tungstate and 5 replicates for baeR on LB+tungstate.
